Event handling - Developer
Skip to content
Event handling
Â¶
If you want to process metadata as it evolves, in real-time, then you'll want to tap into events.
Currently in Atlan, you can
create webhooks
that will send all metadata activity to a target URL of your choice.
In this section you'll find common scenarios to write such a target to handle these events:
Webhook <> Lambda
handling events through an AWS Lambda function

2024-03-14
